website_summaries.verdict: Once you clear the plastic film hurdle, you’ll find yourself with a high-quality chalkboard that is small enough to mount in tight spaces or use with an easel.
pros: Great for those looking for a smaller chalkboard
Comes as a complete set that includes an eraser, chalk, and magnets
Nice quality and look for the money
cons: The board ships with a plastic film that can be very annoying to remove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is wonderful. I don’t know why people gave such bad reviews on it! The clear plastic came off with no problem what so ever. I bought this to use for writing down my sons daily schedule when he is being babysat. I’m putting it on the wall. Then when he’s older I’ll give it to him. But this is perfect and I have zero complaints. I like the different color pieces of chalk that it comes with— very cute! I love it. Very happy!!!! *update. It is now hung! Super happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Chalk writes like my childhood detention punishment
customer_reviews.text: This is my garage to do list. Writes and erases perfectly. It replaces a whiteboard that doesn't erase and markers dry out in 7 seconds. Easy install. Chalk writes like my childhood detention punishment, but with pretty colors. Easy erase. Chalk breaks when drunk husband tries to write "Phillip is awesome." in all the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my granddaughters for Christmas.They thoroughly enjoyed them and still are. The chalk boards arrived on time and extremely well packaged and are great value for money. In these days of digital toys the chalk boards are a traditional toy which will last and last
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I love my chalkboard! The eraser actually works and it came with so much chalk. It was easy to hang and all the magnets that come with it work well, and I also think it looks adorable on my wall! The only bad thing, and it’s pretty annoying, there’s this protective plastic on the blackboard part that they assembled the frame on top of, so you have to try to rip it out from between the frame and the chalkboard and it’s never going to fully be removed I don’t think.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding chalkboard and superior customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to affix to a child’s easel. Can mount to a wall as well. Lightweight. Super easy to mount. Just run a knife around edge of board to remove protective film. First one arrived damaged (footprint on the carton which bent the board. Seller sent free replacement immediately although it was delivery damage. My 3 year old is loving this! Comes with 2 sets multicolor chalk and a great eraser!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Chalkboard works great and love the magnetic eraser and blue smiley magnets! Seller is wonderful, if you have any issues let them know and they will take good care of you! IMPORTANT TIP: The thin film on the board removes easily IF you just take your time and do this: Score around inside edges of the board with a sharp blade and then lift a corner. Then continue to score around again as you are lifting that section of the film. Doing this gave me a nice clean removal all the way around. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: paws413

customer_reviews.title: Love this board!!
customer_reviews.text: Board is as described! Directions are very thorough. I contacted the seller about removing the tray and they responded with accurate instructions (wish I would have contacted them sooner instead of reading the Q&As that had inaccurate info). If anyone is looking to remove the tray - remove the screws on the 2 corners and remove carefully and replace the screws after. Easy peasy. Love the board!
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: At this price, for such a simple item, there shouldn't be disappointment with the basics. The blackboard itself is flimsy and the eraser is not very effective, that may be because the surface is such poor quality. I'm sorry I didn't open it and return before giving it to my grandson. I simply didn't expect "disappointing" for the price I paid for a simple item.
customer_reviews.author: JMcC

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality blackboard
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old grand daughter uses this to teach school. lol. It is a nice quality, erases well. The chalk is a little thin and breaks easily, but I will just pick up some thicker chalk. Like how the erases has a magnetic strip that keeps it on the board, so it is in easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: owlbert

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this! Will definitely be purchasing again in the future but would really appreciate receiving a "free" one. This board blew me away I have to admit I was surprised. What I really, really liked are the adjustable hanging hooks! Very cool! I liked that they provided supplies and hope they will continue to do so. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Am using it in conjunction with scrabble letters with added magnets. Looks great. Plastic film is annoying to remove... score the edge near the trim with scissors for a cleaner removal.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chalkboard. This is a painted steel surface
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chalkboard. This is a painted steel surface, that works great with liquid chalk markers. Erases perfectly with a damp cloth. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: John Mark

customer_reviews.title: A great seller with awesome products :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this magnetic chalk board for homeschooling my daughter and it was a great purchase that is affordable Thank you for shipping it so fast to me and for making this transaction so pleasant it looks awesome in her homeschool room and is working out great it really has stepped up my homeschooling I will be ordering from you again soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as learning tools for my grand-kids, the chalk boards were well made, easy to mount and came with everything my gran-daughter's needed to enjoy right out of the box - they were well protected in the shipping box, no worries as far as damage, they came on time as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk board for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a month ago. I did a lot of on line research and decided on this product based on the reviews. I will say many of the reviews mentioned the difficultly in removing the chalkboard covering. I don't know if the design has been changed, but I had no problem removing the film. I have used both the provided chalk sticks and chalk markers on the board. Both of these can be erased though the chalk sticks provided with the chalk board are more prominent and easily erased than the chalk markers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Chalkboard is great and light
customer_reviews.text: This Chalkboard is great and light.... Everything from the chalkboard set came in the 2 magnets, the 2 packages of 7 piece chalk sticks, the eraser .. its also a great use for children...The plastic film is not difficult to take off but if its not taken off carefully little pieces of the plastic film stays but the chalkboard is still good for use its not much of a bother but I just thought I should let u know.... anyways is a great product and I am satisfy
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases ever. My husband wanted it for 2 yr old grand-dtr and it was an instant hit. As soon as she comes into our house, she heads straight to her chalkboard room. This board is very lightweight so don’t expect an old school blackboard. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: emohio

customer_reviews.title: A great product and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed as I, like many, now work remotely until it is safe to return to work. The seller is honest and will work quickly to correct even the slightest issue. I will definitely purchase from this seller again!! Thank you Navy Penguin!!
customer_reviews.author: ReiKay

customer_reviews.title: An excellent chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I love having a chalkboard in my kitchen so I can write menus. This one is from tonight. All vegetables are from our garden, the fish from wegmans. The accessories are fine and the company is headed by a real person. Buy this and you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: it hangs up nicely and it is very cute and handy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, the chalk writes smoothly, it hangs up nicely and it is very cute and handy. My only feedback would be the plastic sealing that was over the board when it came, it was kind of a pain to get off and some of it is still stuck in the corners. I wonder if there is a different kind they could use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive and good for years!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for a two year old. She loves it. And it came with bright chalk and an eraser. We use a microfiber cloth for a cleaner erase, but the quality is great and the 8 year old brother is equally excited with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aryn

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and it "receives" the chalk well: the chalk shows up brightly, and erases pretty well. So far, it's survived my little monster, and when she loves a toy, she really loves a toy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid who loves to draw and it's still going strong! Perfect size to hang for him to draw and write. He uses it daily and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Clumsy introvert

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We just received the Chalkboard a few days ago. We used it to hold all of the magnets we have collected while traveling. It works great, however, the only problem we had was getting the plastic covering off. We read the information sent with the product, but it still a great way to show your magnets. Other than the plastic covering problem, I would still recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use for Darts scoring. Like shelf for eraser and chalk. I used double sided tape to put on block wall but there are two rings for attaching with nail etc. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is great! I really like the surface - it cleans easily and is a good size. One word of advice. . . Like another person mentioned, take your time removing the protective plastic sheet. It takes a little patience but comes off so no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J.

customer_reviews.title: Would be a 5 star if I could hang it up
customer_reviews.text: Great price, it is true to size and it arrived on time in a double box. Emailed shortly after I ordered with confirmation and shipping info which was nice. However after I unwrapped and attempted to hang it one of the sliding hooks wouldn't move. The box wasn't damaged so I'm not sure how the top left side got warped. Also no directions as to how to remove the removable tray without damage. I really needed this today and can't wait a week for a new one so I guess I'm stuck😕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this board
customer_reviews.text: I've been teaching my grandson to read. We're using this as an additional tool to help him learn different words. He loves writing on this board and also erasing the words I ask him to identify. It seems to be a good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Renick

customer_reviews.title: Study but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Cali board because I have to have oral surgery & might not be able to talk. I picked this one because I thought it might be a good value as it comes with chalk & an eraser. It’s a great size plus it can be hung!
customer_reviews.author: Sharen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed ! Well made. Carefully packed. Quality item. I am extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: LMP

customer_reviews.title: Child’s chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that the chalk was broken in all the sets we received.
customer_reviews.author: LVgal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment! i hung up on wall and my kids use it all the time. everything included is value for the money spent
customer_reviews.author: CAITLIN D.

customer_reviews.title: This item is a great gift for a child that likes to draw
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great gift for a child that likes to draw. I purchased it for my two year old Grandson and he spends unless time with it. He enjoys that the board is big enough so that Mom or Dad or Gram can draw along with him. Great product, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. The only thing is we are using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A chalkboard that was completely magnetic. Well built. Sturdy. The only thing is we are using it horizontally and you cant move the chalk holder to the other side so it is a little inconvenient. If not for that I would have given them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Queencie

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. My daughters love this board, easy to write on, see, and clean. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Porcha Cedano

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my daughter’s art studio.

customer_reviews.title: Forget no more
customer_reviews.text: Helps me keep track of 11 shih tzu’s scheduled bathings. 👍💥
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Message Center
customer_reviews.text: This is a great message center! I've hung it next to the kitchen phone to write messages with the chalk handy so everyone can see and never miss another message. The only thing is I had a heck of a time getting the protective plastic off the chalk board part. Maybe a handy pull tab in the corner? But other than that no issues. Would buy for a friend and highly recommend. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle

customer_reviews.title: Great little chalk board!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, I am very happy with this purchase. Received it quicker than they indicated we would.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Brought it as a Christmas gift for my little sister ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought it as a Christmas gift for my little sister. She loves it but now I get to teach her math on it so maybe she has mixed felling.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: HATE the eraser
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand the eraser. Have to push so hard and it still doesn't do the best job. Other than that, pretty decent chalk board.
customer_reviews.author: T. Steele

customer_reviews.title: A Gift for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My two brothers are in love with this! I love how it already comes with an eraser and different color chalk. So i don't have to spend more money to buy more. To take off the cover of the board was a little tricky, but i was able to take it off eventually.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Chalk Board
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivery, great as usual. Board well worth the money, not so much the chalk. Only used chalk couple of times, and it has broken into about 5 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Fallen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a four child!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old great-grand-daughter is really enjoying this one X-mas present, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: coyotehunter67

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase! We bought it for our toddler, who had shown an inclination to drawing/doodling, and we could barely tear her away from this. The build quality is great, so I know this will be something that she'll be able to grow up with.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my granddaughter. It has helped her to not be so nervous when she is asked by her teacher to complete a math problem or other class subject on the blackboard in her classroom.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good quality. And the packaging is great.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board! Definitely worth its price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this board for my toddler and he loves it! It’s the perfect size for him, & I love that it comes with chalks & the eraser! It also comes with two little magnets & you can hang it as well and that part is adjustable which is amazing! Everything about the board is awesome extremely recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. The chalkboard is very nice and our grandkids just love it. Very sturdy and well made. The protective plastic was a little hard to get off, but it did protect the board. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My two year old great granddaughter loves this product. It keeps her busy for quite a while. We did not hang it. She sits on the couch, with it on her lap, with a towel underneath, and colors away. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Really great product, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is amazing, it's very smooth to write on, and I absolutely love it! The plastic film is a breeze to remove.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase! My little one loves writing with chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase! My little one loves writing with chalk on a board, and this board serves its purpose so well! Comes with everything she needed to write to her heart's content. Super happy with purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chalkboard- perfect for what I needed and love that eraser was magnetic- I did not like the peel off film on the chalkboard because it was very hard to remove it!!!!

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Good slate chalkboard which can be hung.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted slate, and this item provided that. Well made for the price which I thought was very reasonable. This board can be hung which for me was a necessary feature. The chalk, eraser, and magnets were a bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice chalkboard. It was a gift for my 7 year old. He’s happy with it. I like the chalk, eraser and magnets it came with, too. Great deal.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service!

My first board came in with a dent. And, with no questions asked, Navy Penguin shipped another one ASAP. Love this product and them!

customer_reviews.text: Love my chalk board! The board has helped me to be more efficient in the kitchen for marking off daily chores and keeping a current shopping list. Thank you for the variety of colored chalks too! Rose Marie, San Diego
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Spellman

product_meta.title: Chalkboard Set - Framed Black Board 24 x 18 inch + 1 Magnetic Eraser, 14 Chalk Sticks (7 Colors) and 2 Magnets - Small Wall Hanging Blackboard with Frame for Home, Kitchen and Kids (24x18")
product_meta.description:
Size:24x18" LandscapeChalkboard Set - Chalk Board + Accessories 

✔ Premium Pack - contains 1 black chalk board + 1 magnetic chalk eraser + 14 colored chalk sticks (7 colors in total, 2 pcs from each) + 2 magnets. 
✔ Easy to install - Movable hanging hooks allow to adjust hanging distance easily. Attachable chalk tray is also included to keep chalks, markers, erasers and other board accessories handy. 
✔ Multifunctionality - this personal chore chalkboard is perfect for presentation, education, to do lists, planning work schedules or kids learning. Suitable decor for outdoor, home, kitchen, fridge, office, cubicle, desk, class, school, kindergarten, college, dorm room, locker room, game sport room. Big help for managers, teachers, students and children. 
✔ Durable but lightweight - the blackboard has heavy duty aluminum frame. Resin-painted steel surface is easy for writing, painting, erasing, drawing pictures and signs. 
✔ Perfect Size - exact size of the board is 24" x 18". Portable, hangable, sturdy. 

REMINDER: The board's surface is covered by protective plastic film. Before use, cut along the board frame (using kitchen or stationery knife) and tear off the film using your fingers 
CHOKING HAZARD: The set contains small parts. To avoid choking hazard, keep the magnets and chalks away from kids and babies under 3 years. 

Navy Penguin - Lifetime Guarantee 
If you for any reason are not happy with any product by The Navy Penguin, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will do our best to solve your problem asap! At The Navy Penguin we take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products.
feature_bullets: COMPLETE SET - this combo chalkboards set contains 1 black chalk board + 1 magnetic eraser + 14 colored crayons (7 colors) + 2 magnets (accessories).

PORTABLE DESIGN AND SIZE - exact size of the chalk board is 24 x 18 in (medium, hangable in Landscape/Horizontal orientation only). Movable hooks allow to adjust a hanging distance easily (the board is wall mounted).
STURDY BUT LIGHTWEIGHT - the blackboard has heavy duty aluminum frame. Resin-painted steel surface is easy for writing, paint, erasing, drawing pictures and signs.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL USE - this personal chore chalkboard is perfect for kids education, menu, to do list or planning schedules. Suitable decor for outdoor, home, kitchen, office, cubicle, classroom, school, kindergarten, college, dorm, locker and sport room. Useful tool for teachers, students and children.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - if you for any reason are not happy with the blackboard, please contact us, we'll send you a free replacement or refund your money.
